name: Burning Beach
description:
In this game, you take the role of an average duck beach-guard. Your job is to make sure that none of the humans burns to death or starves.

I recommend downloading the file instead of using the web page since the visuals here are slightly compressed.

This game was made for the " I Can't Draw but Want To Make A Game (Again)" Game jam: https://itch.io/jam/i-cant-draw-but-want-to-make-a-game-again

This is also my first finished game! I hope that you enjoy it! <3
